name: ReplayLastCheckpoint
description: Recreation of the "Replay Last Checkpoint" module from MegaHack and GDMO, primarily intended for non-Windows platforms.

spacebar.name: Space Bar to Replay
spacebar.description:
Enables the spacebar as a shortcut to restarting the level from the last checkpoint, because apparently GDMO forgot about this.
(MegaHack too, but don't fret: MHv8 completely ignores whether or not you've toggled this. I wish that sentence was a joke.)

What do you mean, "it's not that deep, bro"?
